Class ServiceCallback<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.lucko.helper.utils.ServiceCallback<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the service class type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Terminable

    @NonnullByDefault
public final class ServiceCallback<T>
extends Object
implements Terminable
    A wrapper to always provide the latest instance of a service.
